title: Mobile
content:
Mobile Your movement speed increases, and difficult terrain doesn't slow you down when you Dash. If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke Opportunity Attacks from your target.

Your movement speed increases, and difficult terrain doesn't slow you down when you Dash.

If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke Opportunity Attacks from your target.

Mobile is a Feat in Baldur's Gate 3. Feats are special talents or expertises that provide special capabilities to characters. At certain levels, your character will get to choose between an Ability Score Improvement feature or a Feat.

Mobile Information

Your movement speed increases, and difficult terrain doesn't slow you down when you Dash. If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke Opportunity Attacks from your target. Class Features: Speed Increased Mobile: Evade Opportunity Attack Mobile: Evade Difficult Terrain

Speed Increased Mobile: Evade Opportunity Attack Mobile: Evade Difficult Terrain

How to unlock Mobile

You'll need to fulfill the following requirements to unlock Mobile

All Classes at Lvl 4

BG3 Mobile Tips & Notes

Effective for Rogues who can now save their Bonus Action for Cunning Action: Hide for repeated hit and run tactics. This can also be effective for ranged characters or casters, allowing them to reposition without provoking attacks. The message "Sluggardly" will pop-up when the evade Opportunity Attack effect is triggered.
